definition: The second month of the year, typically consisting of 28 or 29 days, known for being a time of transition from winter to spring. It is commonly used in calendars, date references, and discussions related to seasons and time.

examples.german: Im Februar ist es oft kalt.
examples.english: In February, it is often cold.

examples.german: Im Februar fängt der Frühling langsam an.
Februar ist der zweite Monat des Jahres.
examples.english: February is the second month of the year.
